title: Preserving your true legacy
description: Your legacy isn't written someday - it's built today. Lifeli.me preserve the moments, thoughts, and lessons that make your story worth remembering.
aboutSubtitle: From Adam Trnka, Founder of lifeli.me
aboutP1: I grew up with my mom and grandma, trying to piece together who I was from stories, photos in boxes. I'm a father now and everything changed when my son was born.
aboutP2: I found myself filming little videos just for him. Not for social media. Not for likes. For the day he turns 15â€¦ 18â€¦ 30. I wanted him to know who I really was, how I laughed, what I believed, what mattered to me.
aboutP3: But these pieces of my life and his were scattered everywhere. On phones. Clouds. Old drives. Nothing felt lasting. Nothing felt safe. So I built lifeli.me.
aboutP4: lifeli.me is my answer to a simple but powerful question:
aboutP4b: What do we leave behind - and will it still matter 30... 50... 100... years from now?
aboutP5: It's a place to craft your legacy, one memory at a time. It's built for familiesâ€”for the quiet, important moments. Births. First steps. Last hugs.
aboutP6: Photos, videos, letters to your future self. Milestones. Your treasures. All organized, preserved, and portable for decadesâ€”like a Svalbard Global Seed Vault, only for your memories.
aboutP7: This isn't about going viral. It's about being remembered for who you are and remembering who we are.
aboutP8: I believe every person deserves a place to hold their story. Not just for today, but for generations to come.
aboutP9: That's why I'm building lifeli.me. Not as a product. But as a promise.
successDescription: Thank you for joining our waitlist. We'll notify you as soon as we launch.
dataTrackingConsent: By joining, you agree to our data tracking. We use your first name to personalize email salutations.
cookieCompact: We use cookies to enhance your experience
cookieDescription: We collect browser information and approximate location (country/region) to improve our service. This data helps us understand our users better and is stored securely in accordance with GDPR regulations.
cookieFooter: By accepting, you agree to the storage of cookies and data collection as described in our Privacy Policy.
emailTitle: Amazing, You're on the list! ðŸŽ‰
emailP1: I'm Adam, founder of lifeli.me and I want to personaly thank you for joining the waitlist.
emailP2: I started building lifeli.me because I wanted a place to capture the parts of life that truly define us - the moments, sounds, stories, and lessons that deserve to last for future generations.
emailP3: Soon, you'll be able to craft your own timeline, week by week - adding photos, videos, voice, notes, and reflections that grow into your personal legacy - same as the medieval kings and monarchs.
emailP4: You're now part of the early circle shaping how lifeli.me evolves. Until the public launch, you can follow our progress and updates on social like
emailP5: If you'd like to share your thoughts, ideas, or just say hi - I'd love to hear from you. You can reach me directly at
emailP5b: and we can even plan a call ;-)
emailFooter: You received this email because you signed up for the lifeli.me waitlist.
emailUnsubscribe: We dont wan't want to hold you and if you don't want you can
privacyIntro: At lifeli.me, your memories belong to you â€” always. We exist to help you preserve what defines you, not to profit from your data.
privacyWhatWeCollectIntro: We only ask for what's truly needed:
privacyWhatWeCollectItem1: so we can communicate about your account and updates.
privacyWhatWeCollectItem2: only when you agree to cookies. This helps us understand how lifeli.me is used and improve your experience.
privacyWhatWeCollectFooter: We never collect or store sensitive personal data without your clear consent.
privacyWhereDataIntro: Your data is securely stored in trusted cloud infrastructure:
privacyWhereDataFooter: Both are GDPR-compliant and based in EU data centers or equivalent-protection regions.
privacyRightsIntro: You always stay in control of what you share:
privacyRightsItem1: Export or delete your data anytime
privacyRightsItem3: Withdraw consent for cookies or communications instantly
privacyProtectionItem1: All information is encrypted in transit and at rest
privacyProtectionItem2: Private-by-default access: nothing is public unless you explicitly share it
privacyProtectionItem3: Optional AI features (e.g., transcription or tagging) are opt-in only and processed within the EU
privacyCookiesIntro: We use minimal analytics to understand performance and usage.
privacyCookiesWhenAccept: When you accept cookies, we may record:
privacyCookiesFooter: This data helps us refine usability â€” never for advertising, profiling, or sale.
privacyInShort: You own your memories. lifeli.me simply helps you keep them â€” safely, privately, and with full transparency.
privacyContact: If you ever have a question or request, reach out directly:
serviceP1: You've chosen a path built on courage, discipline, and responsibility â€” and that deserves to be remembered with the same care you give to others.
serviceP2: lifeli.me was created by someone who serves in the Army Reserve, driven by the same sense of duty and purpose â€” to preserve the stories, values, and milestones that define a life of service.
serviceP3: Here, you can record your experiences, reflections, and memories â€” not for glory, but for meaning. Your story matters â€” to your family, your comrades, and to those who will one day want to know what kind of people protected what they now have.
serviceP4: As a small thank-you, we're offering priority access and early benefits to verified members of the military, police, and firefighting services who join lifeli.me.
serviceP5: Please note: after registration to the product (not the waitlist), we'll contact you to verify your service before applying these benefits.
serviceP6: Your service builds history. lifeli.me helps you keep it alive.
serviceClosing: Your service builds history. lifeli.me helps you keep it alive.
